name: Grindius
description:
Welcome to Grindius, the only rail shooter where you actually grind a rail. 

Press O to shoot 

Press X to jump

Hopping on helicopters will build combos. Each helicopter jumped on or shot down will give you points according to your combo chain. Go for a high score!

Made for the Basic Shmup Showcase https://itch.io/jam/basic-shmup
